title: Christian

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role roles, the game continues as normal
-You know you’re the Christian.
-You have a random ability at the start of every night
-If this role roles, the host must be hanged

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Start a host hanging once per game. If they’re hanged, the host is not hanged and all evils win.
-Use a random ability each night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get the host hanged, then save them because you love your lord and savior
